title: Avenge the Ironhands
content: Queen's Temple) (Infiltrate Steel Watch Foundary from roof.) (Use the Vent X-246, Y-126 to get inside.) If you want to save the Gondians, you need to save the hostages in Iron Throne. (see quest Save the Gondians) After you blow up the Foundary, the Ironhand Gnomes show up and confront any surviving Gondians. If Barcus is still alive, you can make him the new leader with a PERSUASION check and both Gondians and Ironhands become allies. Intimidate Wulbren to walk away and he promise death on both
